scenes.title: Three-front war for growth
scenes.main_point: AI raised expectations, collapsed distribution, and intensified competition for every value prop.
scenes.scene_summary: AI raised expectations, collapsed distribution, and put everyone in a three-front war.
scenes.scene_prompt:
Cyberpunk neon style, dark urban setting, glowing neon lights, futuristic tech.
A lone startup founder stands at a neon-lit street intersection where three holographic fronts collide: rising customer expectation graphs, crumbling distribution pipelines, and rival silhouettes of incumbents, startups, and customers.
In a rain-slick alley of towering digital billboards, the founder braces under pressure as their value proposition flickers like a stressed hologram.

scenes.title: The new playbook: Trust
scenes.main_point: A new growth model emerged around trust as the core lever.
scenes.scene_summary: A new playbook emerged, and it centered growth on one concept: trust.
scenes.scene_prompt:
Cyberpunk neon style, dark urban setting, glowing neon lights, futuristic tech.
The same lone strategist from scene 1 stands before a holographic city-growth dashboard, replacing three competing warfront icons with one radiant symbol labeled “TRUST.”
On a rain-slick rooftop overlooking the neon skyline, the model reorganizes into acquisition and retention paths orbiting the trust core, conveying focused resolve.

scenes.title: Classic channels stopped working
scenes.main_point: SEO, paid search, and corporate social degraded as AI changed discovery and economics.
scenes.scene_summary: SEO, SEM, and corporate social got pricier and weaker as AI intercepted attention.
key_elements: LLM answer engines replacing search clicks
scenes.scene_prompt:
Cyberpunk neon style, dark urban setting, glowing neon lights, futuristic tech.
Same startup strategist from prior scene stands before a holographic dashboard in a neon alley office, watching SEO/SEM graphs spike in cost while clicks collapse.
A torrent of AI-generated content and LLM answer panels floods the display as corporate social posts show throttled external links, the strategist looks tense.

scenes.title: Trust-based acquisition channels
scenes.main_point: Employee-led social, creators, community, and product-led brand built word of mouth.
scenes.scene_summary: Employee voices, creators, community, and product experience drove word of mouth through trust.
scenes.scene_prompt:
Cyberpunk neon style, dark urban setting, glowing neon lights, futuristic tech.
Same startup founder from prior scenes stands in a neon-lit alley hub, surrounded by employees livestreaming transparently on holo-screens, a trusted creator amplifying the message, and a small community circle engaging.
The product’s glowing interface is shared hand-to-hand as word-of-mouth ripples outward through connected neon network lines, mood: confident trust.

scenes.title: Trust-based retention in a commoditized world
scenes.main_point: AI weakened cost/efficiency value props; retention depended on confidence in ongoing outcomes.
scenes.scene_summary: As AI commoditized utility, customers stayed with products they trusted to keep improving.
scenes.scene_prompt:
Cyberpunk neon style, dark urban setting, glowing neon lights, futuristic tech.
The same startup founder and small team from prior scenes stand in their neon-lit street-level workspace, facing a wall-sized holographic dashboard labeled “Trust,” “Roadmap,” “Feedback,” “WOW UX,” “Lifecycle,” “Outcome pricing.”
Around them, generic AI vendor kiosks blur into identical glowing signs, while loyal customers remain engaged at the team’s console, implying calm confidence in ongoing improvements.

scenes.title: Operational shift and closing warning
scenes.main_point: Trust required org alignment, velocity, and building in public; collapse accelerated.
scenes.scene_summary: Teams aligned, shipped fast, built in public, and raced before channels collapsed completely.
key_elements: Closing warning: collapsing faster than expected
scenes.scene_prompt:
Cyberpunk neon style, dark urban setting, glowing neon lights, futuristic tech.
Same founder/executive and cross-functional team from prior scenes huddle around a holographic roadmap, rapidly pushing micro-releases while builder avatars stream updates publicly.
On a rooftop command hub overlooking the neon city, acquisition-channel billboards flicker and collapse as trust metrics surge, the team urgent and resolved.
